main_definition: Easily seen or noticed; able to be perceived with the eyes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Capable of being clearly seen at a distance.
meanings_and_examples.example: The mountains were visible from our valley.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Able to be detected by the eyes or other means of observation.
meanings_and_examples.example: When she applied makeup, her freckles became more visible.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a list, positioned before others in order or importance.
meanings_and_examples.example: The first item on the agenda is visible as the meeting commences.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Acknowledged by society; recognized and known to many people.
meanings_and_examples.example: His achievements have made him a highly visible public figure.
